sectionTitle: Check out some of our work

qualiobra.description: Gamified quality management system for construction. Workers earn points for quality compliance and PPE/CPE use. AI chat (Quali) for service validation through images and videos.

qualiclub.description: Fintech project for the construction industry. Innovative financial solutions for builders and workers.

qualibroker.description: Smart sales management app for builders, developers, and real estate agents. Check available units, run simulations, and reserve units.

engeral.description: Modern institutional website for a construction company, highlighting projects and expertise in construction.

casa-facil.description: Website for a structural concrete block manufacturing industry, with product catalog and contact.

araujo-empreendimentos.description: Institutional website for a developer, presenting projects and investment opportunities.
